pages.text: Using $(thing)Electrical Stimulation$(0), it is possible to Synthesize certain pairs of Adjacent Base Powers together. $(br2)I call the results $(3)Esoteric Powers$(0). Who knows what properties these elusive Powers might bring about?
This Diagram depicts the Relationships between the Powers.
With these Underlying Theories, I predict the existence of $(4)exactly three Esoteric Powers$(0), each formed by combining two Base Powers in a charged Crucible.
